title: Generate root Xcode catalog
description: When enabled, creates the root .xcassets folder and its Contents.json.

title: Root catalog path
description: Root folder path for the catalog. Supports nested paths using '/'. Ignored if root catalog generation is disabled.

title: Folder name format
description: Format used for color set folder names.

title: Write back folder names
description: Save generated folder names back to tokens as a custom property.

title: Custom property name
description: Name of the custom property where generated folder names will be saved.
